data.reset_password_page_sub_title: Please enter a new password below:
data.reset_password_error_code_ten: We apologise but the app has experienced an error. Please try again.
data.reset_password_error_code_eleven: We apologise, but it seems that your code is invalid. Please check and try again.
data.reset_password_error_code_twelve: We apologise, but the link to reset your password has expired. Please request a new one.
data.reset_password_error_code_thirteen: This link has already been used to reset your password. Please request a new one.
data.reset_password_error_code_thirtyfour: Thank you for your request. If your profile has been found you will receive an email within the next few hours with a re-set code.
data.reset_password_success: Your password has been changed and you can now log in.
data.rewards_modal_points_balance: and your current balance is only
data.addon_modal_tagline: Add to your booking with one click!
data.addon_modal_confirm_desc: Please confirm you want to add this Enhancement to your booking:
data.addon_modal_charge_desc: We will charge the card that you made your booking with. This enhancement is covered by the same terms and policies as the booking it is associated with.
data.addon_modal_charge_confirm: You can add this enhancement to your stay by clicking confirm below. Payment will be taken at the hotel. This enhancement is covered by the same terms and policies as the booking that it is associated with.
data.cancel_reservation_modal_title: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
data.cancel_reservation_modal_error_desc: You are unable to cancel this booking
data.modify_reservation_modal_desc_short: You can now modify your booking
data.modify_reservation_modal_desc_long: Update your dates and number of occupants on the booking bar to search again
data.modify_reservation_modal_error_desc: You are unable to modify this booking
data.modify_points_reservation_modal_error_de: As your booking was made with points, please call us to cancel / modify your stay
data.modify_reservation_modal_abort_desc: Your changes will not be saved if you navigate away from this page in order to update your booking you need to finish the reservation process
data.reservation_lookup_modal_error: Sorry, we cannot find a reservation that matches your details, please check them and try again.
data.reservation_lookup_modal_login: Your reservation was made while you were logged in, please log in to view it.
data.terms_modal_agree: Please accept the Terms and Conditions to confirm this registration
data.cvv_modal_desc: The CVV Number ('Card Verification Value') on your credit card or debit card is a 3 digit number on VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards. On your American Express® branded credit or debit card it is a 4 digit numeric code.
data.cvv_modal_subdesc: It is found on the signature strip on the back of the card for  VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards. and the 4 digits above the card number on the front of American Express® branded credit or debit card.
data.login_prompt_modal_subtitle: Sign up with us To Claim Your Points and join
data.login_prompt_modal_desc: Create an account to join Sutton Prestige. Accumulate points for each dollar spent. Redeem them for unique gifts & rewards
data.login_registered_prompt_modal_subtitle: Your email address is associated with an existing Sutton Prestige Account
data.login_registered_prompt_modal_desc: Please sign in to continue your booking and earn points and great rewards, or continue your booking with a different email address.
data.contact_page_desc: How was your stay with us? Did we meet all your expectations? We want your stays at our hotels to be the best they can be. You talk, we listen.
data.reservation_lookup_page_desc: You can look up a reservation you made by entering your email address and reservation number below. You can find your reservation number on the email you recieved when you make the booking.
data.news_page_desc: An on-line reference for news, press releases, promotions and current events. Please click on articles for details.
data.offers_page_no_offers_title: Sorry! There are no chain wide offers available at the moment
data.offers_page_no_property_offers_title: Sorry! There are no offers available at the moment for this property
data.offers_page_no_offers_desc: Try selecting a hotel to see offers for that hotel or check back later
